CustomField.description: Data Source will be "Salesforce Org" for analytics as all data comes from child orgs. The Data Store object, however, is generic enough to hold data from additional sources such as the FDIC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Data Source will be "Salesforce Org" for analytics as all data comes from child orgs. The Data Store object, however, is generic enough to hold data from additional sources such as the FDIC.
CustomField.label: Data Source
